METROPOLITAN SCHOOL STUDY COUNCIL
525 West 120th Street
New York 27, N. Y.
November 11, 1955
Federal Radio-Television Education Committee
Federal Security Agency
Washington 25, D.C,
Dear Sin
The TV Utilization Committee is a group of teachers
representing the Metropolitan School Study Council. The
Council represents over seventy school districts in New York,
New Jersey, and Connecticut. Our assignment is to encourage
the utilization of TV education programs. Each member of the
committee would like to be on your mailing list to help them
alert teachers to educational programs. We are enclosing a
list of our committee and also a superintendents mailing list,
Thank you for any help you can give us in this matter.
Yours truly.
^Joseph M. Fillerup
TV Utilization Committee
JMFsPC
